Test Case 1.source_query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN bank_name = 'Federal' THEN total_outstanding ELSE 0 END) AS federal FROM staging_dashboard.collection_details cd WHERE bank_name IN ('Federal')
Test Case 1.destination_query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN p.product_id = 'PD-FED-JLG' THEN ld.total_outstanding ELSE 0 END) AS fed_outstanding FROM transformation.loan_details ld JOIN transformation.customer_application_mapping cam ON cam.customer_id = ld.customer_id JOIN transformation.user_mapping um ON um.loan_id = cam.loan_id JOIN transformation.products p ON cam.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.product_id IN ('PD-FED-JLG')

Test Case 2.source_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN bank_name = 'Federal' THEN loan_account_number END) AS federal FROM staging_dashboard.collection_details cd WHERE bank_name IN ('Federal')
Test Case 2.destination_query: select COUNT(CASE WHEN p.product_id = 'PD-FED-JLG' THEN ld.loan_id ELSE NULL END) AS fed_active_loan from transformation.loan_details ld join transformation.customer_application_mapping cam ON cam.customer_id = ld.customer_id join transformation.user_mapping um ON um.loan_id = cam.loan_id join transformation.products p ON cam.product_id = p.product_id where p.product_id IN ('PD-FED-JLG')

Test Case 7.source_query: SELECT SUM(amount) FROM staging_dashboard.disbursement_details_fed ddf LEFT JOIN staging_dashboard.loan_life_cycle_fed llcf ON ddf.cust_id = llcf.cust_id LEFT JOIN staging_dashboard.customers_fed cf ON ddf.cust_id = cf.cust_id WHERE DATE(llcf.source_created_at) >= '2025-01-01' AND DATE(llcf.source_created_at) <= '2025-01-27' AND llcf.level = 'DISBURSEMENT' AND llcf.status = 'SUCCESS'
Test Case 7.destination_query: SELECT SUM(ld.loan_amount) FROM transformation.loan_details ld LEFT JOIN transformation.application_life_cycle alc ON ld.customer_id = alc.customer_id LEFT JOIN transformation.user_mapping um ON um.application_id = ld.application_id LEFT JOIN transformation.customer_application_mapping cam ON cam.customer_id = ld.customer_id WHERE DATE(ld.disbursed_date) >= '2025-01-01' AND DATE(ld.disbursed_date) <= '2025-01-27' AND alc.level = 'DISBURSEMENT' AND alc.status = 'COMPLETED' AND cam.bank_id = 'FED'
